name: Sound Blaster
description:
Sound Blaster is a bullet hell meets music sequencer. Sound is everything to you. It is your movement, it is your score, and it is also your enemy. How long will you survive?

Ludum Dare Page
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/sound-blaster

Instructions
- Music File Spawns at the end of each sequence
- Drag music file to sequencer to obtain score
- When the indicator crosses your music file it'll spawn a bullet which projects you forward.
- Avoid red bullets

Controls:
A: left rotation
D: right rotation
Mouse Interact: Left Click to drag files to your music sequencer.

Credits:
Design, Program, Art - Daum Park
